verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wounded for me wounded for me
There on the cross
He was wounded for me
Gone my transgressions
And now I am free
All because Jesus
Was wounded for me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Dying for me
Dying for me
There on the cross
He was dying for me
Now in His death
My redemption I see
All because Jesus
Was dying for me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Risen for me
Risen for me
Up from the grave
He has risen for me
Now evermore from
Death's sting I am free
All because Jesus
Has risen for me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Living for me
Living for me
Up in the skies He is living for me
Daily He's pleading
And praying for me
All because Jesus
Is living for me

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Coming for me
Coming for me
One day to earth
He is coming for me
Then with what joy
His dear face I shall see
Oh how I praise Him
He's coming for me
